tldr: Checkout service latency is 3x baseline (1200ms) following a v3.2.1 deploy 25m ago, coinciding with payment gateway timeouts and a 12% error rate.
signals: checkout service latency_ms at 1200ms (3x baseline) for 20m
Logs show ERROR payment timeout to gateway and WARN retrying request
hypotheses: Regression in v3.2.1 deploy causing increased payment gateway timeouts or inefficient payment processing.
External payment gateway issue, potentially exacerbated by v3.2.1 changes.
Resource exhaustion on checkout service due to v3.2.1 changes.
next_actions: Review v3.2.1 changes for checkout service, focusing on payment processing logic.
Check payment gateway status page and internal metrics for external service health.
Monitor checkout service resource utilization (CPU, memory) for saturation.
Prepare for potential v3.2.1 rollback if deploy is confirmed as root cause.
status_update: INC-102 Sev2: Checkout latency elevated (1200ms) post-deploy v3.2.1, seeing payment gateway timeouts. Investigating deploy changes and external service health.
